feed.title: Radarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Radarr: 5.12.2.9335
entry.content:
To receive further Pre-Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 889d0710046e34c7173b64067ecdd0a9ee5b177a New: Display items tags on import lists index
  • 0049922ab6809be48e96726a4f4006d711051b7d Include exception message in SkyHook failure message
  • 3c995a0fff4caf8e68e398dc263887c06211a84f Bump babel packages
  • 430719baacd6cf97ec2eb8a64d77efa0aefbe32d Remove unused gulp packages
  • 9928d711a3bb72d40c99541bfc530eb7bcad811b Trim multiple occurrences of ending separators in filename
  • f90b43b3e1c7d938eaaf290148b488d3b814968a Simplify parsing IMDb and TMDb urls as search terms
  • 64122b4cfb3bf53bdbf5c924baee5e1b0814501a Auto-detect building on macOS ARM (#10539)
  • 7912a942f71256efde95d715474a950248267357 Bump frontend packages
  • 0a7607bb62b26ecec2fff09bd7f48e1a55144437 Bump dotnet packages
  • beeb5204b825f669083cfff56e6a581d0737b5b5 New: Parse IMDB and TMDB URLs as search terms
See More * ab13fb6e99d61c312580d38a70759dd135438dd0 Fix index variable in fuse worker * 2a3d595a66244c3256b87798c3f385bf411e7cc1 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 958a863d8f62bd24714ab132f85c48f10251dcdb Recompare file size after import file if necessary * 8b7884deb0a6ed5d45e01462600a90706f9f3208 Automated API Docs update * 9a22e1c791750fb356a98cba3e402cb9cc348a36 Bump browserslist-db * f0f828491b7002cfa0613241b2b4e73c32d6c4e9 Fixed: Copy to clipboard in non-secure contexts [ #10525 ] * 7f3d107eda88eaa3c5b7e131bdb0f4d6714b79d4 Convert ClipboardButton to TypeScript [ #10452 ] * ce4477eeacc05356752e7757ae35274e68a590ca Improve filename examples for movies naming * 8b64f873f47e732cf318c2874695f087261c948d Convert Naming options to TypeScript * 38bd06096047dfc235451c63938a03c929190df1 Convert FormInputButton to TypeScript * 7c243cb6e8ec9df123f6ecd4f5707668287b69a9 Fixed: Error updating providers with ID missing from JSON * b29dee63f4b493c1e5e28a240bb05155bd7ff199 Use the first allowed quality for cutoff met rejection message with disabled upgrades * f6542bab0a6c05760b4d926d9d87720ed136f38a New: Use 307 redirect for requests missing URL Base * da1b53b7e250df25ebfc5e02f32054d4c6cdced8 Bump macOS runner version to 13 * 0deae95782f2cb21cbbbd15470d0fc8b037a7e61 Bump version to 5.12.2 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Radarr/961c82cf-1428-4ab0-9257-63be1671eac8/_release?releaseId=130&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Radarr: 5.13.1.9378
entry.content:
To receive further Pre-Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 234e23eb4725549629e90150188acb6b7ec3baa3 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 748d88852034df43d2497555c9316948c14cebed Sync metadata changes to UI
  • 00d50a030c6507b620aeeafa61c3d1258a33509a Translate metadata settings
  • 017fa5ad80af2d997e103b5b29cfb3f7d867daae New: Group updates for the same movie for Kodi and Emby / Jellyfin [ #10150 ]
  • d5fb1c55c6536431e7b9eb01aa59eb99c79b3f0a Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 1be8385c416fef514ae301f025dc59a749008ee5 Fix paths mapping for movie specific translations
  • 6f26c55a1b2298cca67ee3deb31923a629bd7ae4 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 2d2de7f76b351b6f4984ab439fcd1a2fa5115e16 Parse "tmdbid" and "imdb" attributes in Newznab and Torznab parsers
  • 2c9292c249c6269e3ee1b2427d5c4dd2553505ae Save ImdbId for grabbed movie events
  • 6747b742718a84fbb380d6eadef329229a6738d4 Convert History to TypeScript [ #10230, #10390, #10247 ]
See More * 13f10906f1b7a725cf939e4db0bca72f44e5b1f2 Fixed: PWA Manifest with URL base [ #10317, #10329 ] * 25d08a67e4bbecc526c09488eb64a2883e9c021f Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * aadefbe3b0886a6d85c4f41a90f28ae5405ef24a Rename 'On Import' to 'On File Import' and 'On Upgrade' to 'On File Upgrade' [ #10164 ] * d99a7e9b8aa9ce67dffa5bd4802b12b33c609ff6 Convert Components to TypeScript [ #10378, #10400, #10425 ] * dc29526961c3f1a5bc37d0127b68b82e85a4d9d8 Convert App to TypeScript [ #10233 ] * f8e47fbdc731527aaf60f679477e144c05b23cdf Tooltips for certification and runtime on details page * 56a7725e52b7ae9485876e2e1332dbeafcbfc92e Improve warning for missing release dates on movie details page when year is not set [ #10569 ] * abf1b9d6cf0d8e3dfbd71337d7536af050957715 Fallback to text searches for FL only if year is defined * dd90bf53dd8c146ebf4ab0a02ec5ee1ac0bbe8bf Bump version to 5.13.1 * cd29c0c9c84ce05913bbdb69d542717de75dd792 Fix stable branch label in update * 9986d04d3614336395c55b3d00313812662f609b Automated API Docs update * f900d623dc46b18a4d33c98fecf24a980ac45b39 New: Allow major version updates to be installed * 84b507faf3c6f28b649479a0d5412007a220f7e8 New: Romania and India added to list of Certification Countries * adb27123df33380f74acfa3a213daa8f38c5f873 Natural sorting for tags list in the UI * a06792b9231c068a65d5832e9c2df7cee7e651c7 New: Sync updates to UI for providers (#10550) * d90ee3ae11bb54f79a00fc94ecfedae37d13e056 Fixed: Release Year mandatory to generate valid file formats * ff38afd198e4078dd1c29fa777403c9c2e52a6d6 Fixed: Add only movies with release dates from monitored collections * db70c06b8ba68e736470bc9a130dcf9da8e0345d Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * fb7656be5638bd5cf5b01bb9c06df39a14854040 New: Parse pt-BR releases as Brazilian Portuguese (#10554) * 3287e7cdecbba2cec8bb58ce9aa1dd07bb2aa1fa Bump dotnet to 6.0.35 * 0761e27cfa73c68e18866a091066b517fa2ab780 New: Parse ES as Spanish * 4f47bb39ac62b14e315eae5efb87624168b1dacf Bump version to 5.13.0 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Radarr/961c82cf-1428-4ab0-9257-63be1671eac8/_release?releaseId=133&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Radarr: 5.14.0.9383
entry.content:
To receive further Pre-Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 781e0c9d1c607ed35dd1595e929bf2a2e5009863 Fixed: Optional square and round brackets for "{Release Year}"
  • c946ed83f958384200a41cc8e60623d80893ac26 Fixed: Stopped/Started as initial state for qBittorrent v5.0
  • 9aecf94e8e0e6b68711145a6669e780af09affe7 Bump version to 5.14.0

This list of changes was auto generated.

entry.title: New release for Radarr: 5.15.1.9463
entry.content:
To receive further Pre-Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 179637fe8ba20c219849e085d395bfccd7e3f300 Fixed: Release dates for Discover Movie posters

* 63c6f70e677f45846fc3ac5da7ffd66341ba24fe Fixed: Changing movies to another root folder without moving files * 79cd6269f4cf393f8eac3051222f065a2566d011 Fixed: Status check for completed directories entry.title: New release for Radarr: 5.16.3.9541
entry.content:
To receive further Pre-Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 99c3c8ce5b03fc75b620e54fc6e96fbee3a2053c Replace URLs in translations with tokens
  • 85171e40a58d65f3e6b2d137701ef95e649e4b6f Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 86b656d323567e1fc83f61a79c41778cbeba91eb Use minor version for core-js in babel/preset-env
  • 5ae5d1043a78990ff3425c93ebb66e98aef531b7 Improve opening add movie modal for Discover Overview
  • b801aa093595a33a55e9edd5cda141c4c55a9bb5 New: Add metadata links to telegram messages [ #10242, #10489 ]
  • b2b5aa1f795632311303256aa5d1271bbe07af1f New: Optionally as Instance Name to Telegram notifications [ #10757 ]
  • 8c6ba9a543a308fcf75d43ab7f4ddd43452d2cd4 Fixed: Augmenting languages from indexer for release with stale indexer ID [ #10768 ]
  • 4e024c51d3832e28e981f1e71a5904953bff32ec Fixed: Movies without tags bypassing tags on Download Client [ #10765 ]
  • e4106f0ede441aa637c50de3bf5279bbddf2ee9d Upgrade TypeScript and core-js [ #10763 ]
  • 9032ac20ff599bda8aa9acd02e6d59741233b4da Bump version to 5.16.3

e016410c1014892d726b600042bd13ea49c027d6 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * bea943adf8ee3544b8d82dce56dd596f3f37d48d New: Tooltip with extra genres on search and collections * Automated API Docs update * 0caa793df4f3c500ea2ed819bae65a98cea03803 New: Add config file setting for CGNAT authentication bypass * 9a107cc8d7bdff79fb6903dffb8aa2ab2bbad3e5 New: Add Languages to Webhook Notifications [ #10733 ] * a6d727fe2a734163fcd23fb7e1180d285115d327 New: Kometa metadata file creation disabled [ #10738 ] * 01a53d362425d3b41977b20c960160112b8e37ea Automated API Docs update * 348c29c9d782e10fe1f7c785f157529c87e5c1a3 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 64739712c6a2c35e631b1e9cd216e66786ea9373 Add return type for movie lookup and import endpoints [ #10737 ] *
